# Government Tender Announcement
## FW012-240600 Aluminum vessels with outboard engines and trailers

### Government Procurement Reference Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4310190084-Doc4312032061
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4310190084
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-06T14:00:00 (Extended)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-12
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-12-27

## Contract Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites bids for the supply and delivery of two (2) Aluminum vessels with outboard engines and trailers.

### Key Requirements

* The vessels must be a non-custom, commonly known model of a work boat with standard features.
* The vessels must be delivered to Fisheries and Oceans Canada, 867 Lakeshore Road, Burlington, Ontario L7S 1A1.
* All deliverables must be received on or before March 29, 2024.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Ms. Vashti Ramnarine (elle-la/she-her)
	+ Email: [vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18027854?extsite=MTgwMjc4NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18027854?extsite=MTgwMjc4NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
